attributes.action: We the undersigned petition The Prime Minister to reintroduce corporal punishment along with a punishment first and rehabilitation second policy in prisons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With respect to general prison life: Prison should be a punishment first with no privileges such as media equipment or newspapers etc and consist of four walls and adequate non-equipment exercise time. Rehabilitation should commence when the sentence is over with the time given being the actual time served and without the good behaviour clauses currently in place. Crimes of violence and anti-social behaviour should be treated by the re-introduction of birching.
